sections.title: External links

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: The section includes a specific claim or information that could be linked to a reliable source for direct evidence.
requirement_evaluations.evidence: The section contains an external link using the UCSC gene info template which provides a hyperlink.
requirement_evaluations.reasoning: The section fully adheres to the requirement by supplying a clear hyperlink to a reliable source.
requirement_evaluations.overlap_notes: No significant overlaps detected with other content areas.

sections.meta_notes: The 'External links' section effectively uses hyperlinks to connect readers to additional reliable information.
